channel.title: Nbcuniversal on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Nbcuniversal on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Dune’ VFX House DNEG’s Immersive Experiences Unit Names NBCU’s Jeff Lehman Executive Producer (Exclusive)
item.description: The exec will work on “blending the cinematic with the tangible to create fully immersive, location-based worlds, an exciting new frontier in experiential entertainment.”

item.title: ‘Dune’ VFX House DNEG’s Immersive Experiences Unit Names NBCU’s Jeff Lehman Executive Producer (Exclusive)
item.description: The exec will work on “blending the cinematic with the tangible to create fully immersive, location-based worlds, an exciting new frontier in experiential entertainment.”

item.title: Peacock Hikes Subscription Prices By $3 Per Month as the Arrival of the NBA Looms
item.description: The company is also rolling out a cheaper plan called Peacock Select, with current seasons of NBC and Bravo shows, and some library content.

item.title: Peacock Hikes Subscription Prices By $3 Per Month as the Arrival of the NBA Looms
item.description: The company is also rolling out a cheaper plan called Peacock Select, with current seasons of NBC and Bravo shows, and some library content.

item.title: NBCUniversal Reaches $3.6 Million Settlement In Lawsuit Over Peacock Subscription Cancellations
item.description: In the lawsuit, Los Angeles County targeted the studio’s failure to give users a simple cancellation method.

item.title: NBCUniversal Reaches $3.6 Million Settlement In Lawsuit Over Peacock Subscription Cancellations
item.description: In the lawsuit, Los Angeles County targeted the studio’s failure to give users a simple cancellation method.

item.title: NBCU Says Surge in Sports Ads Boosts Upfront Sales Haul
item.description: People still want to watch sports on TV, and that means — at least for now — advertisers still need to spend on it. NBCUniversal said Tuesday that its new 11-year deal for NBA rights resul
